sent.orig: Nearly half of the fleet located in North America representing nearly 37,000 aircraft.
sent.trans: 全球机队中，北美地区拥有37，000架飞机，约占全球机队的一半。

sent.orig: We are nearly there, ie have nearly arrived.
Hermione Granger: "Nearly" handless? How can you be nearly handless?
sent.trans: 赫敏·格兰杰：差点没头？你是怎么个差点没头法？

sent.orig: My son had racked up nearly 2,000 incoming text messages and had sent nearly as many.
sent.trans: 我的儿子上个月收到了将近2，000条短信息，他也发送了数量相近的短信息。
